message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"to close (a door or window) or turn off (lights, equipment)","sentence":"他关上门。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing a boy gently closing a door. The background suggests a quiet, slightly surreal, dreamlike environment with soft colors, futuristic ruins, and gentle sunlight casting long shadows. The door is wooden and half-closed, with the boy’s hand on the handle. Vines and cracked concrete hint at a world in transition.","sentence_translation":"He closes the door."}
